questions.question: When can I buy tickets for NG-DE 2025?
questions.answer: Ticket sales have already started! Prices are tiered ‚Äì the earlier you buy, the cheaper your ticket.

questions.question: Will I receive an invoice for my ticket?
questions.answer: Yes, you will receive an invoice by email after purchasing your ticket.

questions.question: Can I pay by invoice?
questions.answer: Yes, you can pay for your ticket via PayPal, Stripe (credit card), or by invoice.

questions.question: Are there any discounts?
questions.answer: Yes, discount promotions are usually announced via our social media channels and can be redeemed during the ticket purchase.

questions.question: Is catering included in the ticket?
questions.answer:
Yes!

Conference days (Nov 6‚Äì7, 2025): A light breakfast, lunch, evening finger food, as well as all drinks and coffee are included.

Workshop day (Nov 5, 2025): A light breakfast, lunch, soft drinks, and coffee are included.

Sustainability focus: The catering is fully vegan to reduce our environmental footprint ‚Äì something we deeply care about.

questions.question: Is there an evening event?
questions.answer: Yes, your ticket includes automatic participation in our evening event. Food and drinks are included in the ticket price.

questions.question: Can I cancel my ticket?
questions.answer: Yes, cancellations are possible in exceptional cases. Please write an email to info@ng-de.org.

questions.question: Why is only vegan food offered?
questions.answer: Sustainability is a core value of the NG-DE Conference. By avoiding animal products, we significantly reduce CO‚ÇÇ emissions and water usage. We also ensure that all attendees ‚Äì regardless of dietary habits or allergies ‚Äì can enjoy high-quality and sustainable meals.

questions.question: What other sustainable practices does NG-DE implement?
questions.answer:
We use an energy-efficient and accessible venue.

All printed materials are reduced to a minimum ‚Äì we rely on digital solutions.

We encourage eco-friendly travel and provide information on sustainable transport options.

Our waste management focuses on recycling and avoiding single-use plastics.

questions.question: Where will the NG-DE Conference 2025 take place?
questions.answer:
NG-DE 2025 will take place at the GLS Campus Berlin:
üìç GLS Campus Berlin, Kastanienallee 82, 10435 Berlin

questions.question: What do I need for check-in?
questions.answer: We are paperless! Please show your QR code at check-in. You will receive it in the confirmation email after purchasing your ticket.

questions.question: Is there a cloakroom?
questions.answer: Yes, you can drop off your luggage at the cloakroom free of charge. Please note that we cannot accept liability for deposited items.

questions.question: Is the venue accessible?
questions.answer: Yes! The main area is on the ground floor, and additional conference rooms and restrooms are accessible via elevator. Feel free to contact us in advance if you need special assistance.

questions.question: How can I become a partner or sponsor?
questions.answer: We offer tailored sponsorship packages to present your company in the best possible way. Contact us at info@ng-de.org to learn more about our options.

questions.question: How can I participate as a speaker at NG-DE?
questions.answer: The program is partially curated, but there is also an open call for papers for a limited number of slots. Submit your proposal via the link provided on our website.

questions.question: Where can I find the conference program?
questions.answer: The current program is available on our website and is updated regularly.
